articles.title: US cancels visas for South Sudanese over deportation dispute - BBC
articles.description: The African nation is "taking advantage" of the US by not accepting its citizens, says the top US diplomat.
articles.content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio has announced that the US is immediately revoking visas issued to all South Sudanese passport holders due to the African nation refusing to accept its citizens who h… [+2189 chars]
